thread.section_title: Ocean County Veterinary Hospital Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ocean County Veterinary Hospital | ocvh.com
thread.title: Cathleen
thread.title_full: Ocean County Veterinary Hospital reviewed by Cathleen

author: Cathleen
title: Cathleen
text: We brought our new rescue Bugsy to Dr. Koenigstein and her staff at Fischer Animal Hospital. Bugsy is new to our home and of course we, and Bugsy, were nervous! Dr. Koenigstein and her staff were so kind and gentle with Bugsy and made the visit as comfortable as possible. Bugsy didn't have the best manners just yet, but they were understanding and treated him like their own. They gave him treats and made sure he was happy before he left. They even offered for Bugsy to stop in and see them for treats if we are nearby! I can't say enough about this amazing, kind staff at Fischer Animal Hospital. We will be patients for life!
